metadata.description:
▶ DeNations Art NFT from Genesis Block (Block Height: 0) of DeNations Art Chain.

▶ NFT owners can use the video and images contained in NFT for non-commercial use.

▶ Check artchain.denations.com/blocks/1 for information of artist and block.

▶ Physical Diasec Glossy Frame of Digital Print 40 x 40cm and high quality printable still image are provided to the NFT owner only. Check artchain.denations.com/blocks/1/physical for information about shippable countries and instructions.

▶ Visit artchain.denations.com/owners to check unlockable contents/ submit shipping address/ register owner information.

▶ When registerd in the National Art Museum of the DeNations' Nation, it can

a) Earn token reward (in DENA) depending on the Art Index and the registration time.

b) Boost DeNations' Nation's DGDP (in DENA) depending on the Art Index and the registration time.

c) Accumulate Experiences over time and public love.

d) Recieve Block Rewards generated from future connected Art Blocks

▶ When it accumulates Experience to the upper limit, it's Level will be raised and it's Art Index will be upgraded.

▶ Refer artchain.denations.com for more details.
metadata.name: LOST: Flag of France
